website_summaries.verdict: An exercise ball with a support ring rather than a frame.
pros: This simple chair is a good option for people who need to fidget or move around as they work
With no frame or back to get in the way, this chair is open and freeing
The inflatable ring grips well and keeps the ball in place
cons: No back support and no wheels to move around easily

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: “Great quality, feels very thick and durable. Perfect to use as a chair to help relieve lower back pain, which was the purpose I intended. Easy to inflate."
customer_reviews.author: hobbygal

customer_reviews.title: Best Exercise Ball Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: This 65 cm ball came with a stability ring and the pump to blow both items up to optimal capacity. The pump is very easy to use. The exercise ball sits nicely inside the stability ring allowing me to exercise as well as use the ball as a chair to assist with better posture. I received an email after ordering as well with helpful tips, tricks and exercises to use with it. I would recommend this product to anyone who wants great quality at an exceptional value.
customer_reviews.author: Amethyst Storey

customer_reviews.title: Thick ball material
customer_reviews.text: The first kit I got the ring had a thin spot in the material from manufacturing that created a goose-egg in it. I contacted the seller and the immediately sent me a replacement. I really like the quality of the material of the ball! It's not flimsy and I'm able to do more exercises and the ball doesn't roll around and slip like other exercise balls I've had (even without the ring). The ring does make it nice to store the ball without it rolling around the room or being able to use it instead of an office chair.
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to a work chair
customer_reviews.text: I love this ball! It is actually more comfortable to use as a work chair, than the chair itself! Also makes you improve your posture. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Dorman

customer_reviews.title: could not use pump to inflate
customer_reviews.text: this is not a good pump that comes with it. The bottom is inflatable and I couldn't get air in it and when some did it kept coming out. Maybe if you get a pump elsewhere but this one has too many wholes in it and it's not a foot pump or a hand pump. not sure what it is but not working. sending ball and pump back to get another one.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Peters

customer_reviews.title: Get a better pump before you start
customer_reviews.text: The ball appears to be sturdy, but I was confused by the directions, - for example why doesn't the tape say 204 instead of 65? 204 cm is the desired circumference of the ball at the 65 mark. Anyway, the ball works well, and is easy to use. The stability stand does have a goose-egg but I'm not sure it effects the functionality. The pump, however, is LAUGHABLE. Don't even bother. Go to a gas station, or get a bicycle pump somewhere. The little cheesy foot pump would take hours of pumping.
customer_reviews.author: DailyReader

customer_reviews.title: Great for pregnancy exercises!
customer_reviews.text: I will be 36 months pregnant and this exercise ball works perfectly for pregnancy exercises I have seen on youtube. It comes nicely packaged in a sturdy box and the material of the ball and stability ring is very durable and heavy weight. It definitely supports a good amount of weight as I have packed on some pounds throughout this pregnancy. I also like the stability ring because it helps with balance. Overall, I would definitely recommend this exercise ball to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Love the color
customer_reviews.text: Love the turquoise color of the yoga ball and the inflatable ring which comes with it to stop it from moving around. I followed the instructions which stated to inflate it to 80% before waiting 24 hours until inflating again to the full size. A tape measure was included to make sure it was right. So far it’s been a great tool using it as a seat at my desk and exercising
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for abdominal excercises and I love it. Used in coordination with my excercise bands I get a quick workout and it does not take up much room in my house. I am very pleased with this product. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dukeybell

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Size!
customer_reviews.text: I have gotten this product twice from this seller- and ordered the 65cm item. Both times the box and ball are labeled as 65cm but after inflated the yoga ball measures 75cm! I didn't notice at first, but my feet wouldn't rest on the floor and was getting headaches from looking down at my computer screen. Unfortunately, as a petite person 75cm is just too tall for me. Be aware there may be a whole batch/shipment that is labeled incorrectly. This is a bummer because it seems sturdy and a pretty color. :-(
customer_reviews.author: Rachel M.

customer_reviews.title: for a wiggle worm
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a wiggle worm who is doing classroom work in from of a computer these days . . . He started off with a chair on wheels . . . Well now he can wiggle to his hearts contect without rolling up and down the hallway wrecking the floors . . . goood deal.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Q.

customer_reviews.title: Missing stabilizer ring
customer_reviews.text: I’m quite satisfied with the exercise ball, but the stability ring is completely missing. The stability ring was the main reason I purchased this one... Very upsetting. :( The product had been removed from its original box and put into another, bigger box. The original box was then folded up and also put in the new box. I imagine this has to do with why the stability ring is missing...It wasn’t put into the new box.
customer_reviews.author: Kitt

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Most important to me is the quality of the material, and I'm pleased with this one. It's much better than the slicker, thinner-walled exercise balls provided at my gym classes. I'm also a fan of the stability ring. It not only assists with exercising but "shelves" the ball when I'm not using it.
customer_reviews.author: Ogstel

customer_reviews.title: No more lower back pain
customer_reviews.text: I sit for 8 hrs a day getting up in between but for most part my lower back would go out due to a pinched nerve. It's been about a week I inflated over two days to the height I needed for my desk ... No complaints
customer_reviews.author: Familyof7

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest materials or pump
customer_reviews.text: The pump is crappy but gets the job done. The inflatable base came with a hole in it and will not even inflate. Kind of a bummer as I use this for an office chair so the base would have been nice to keep me steady.
customer_reviews.author: Danika

customer_reviews.title: Comfy yoga ball/desk chair
customer_reviews.text: I like the matching ball and stability ring. It was very easy to inflate. The quality is great. One day delivery was awesome, too. I’m using this as a desk chair. It is pretty comfy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Hensel

customer_reviews.title: Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a replacement for the chair at my desk and it's much more comfortable. The base keeps the ball from rolling everywhere in my room. I like that I can move around and stabilize my core muscles without really noticing. Very comfortable. Happy I picked it. I also love the color.
customer_reviews.author: Catey H

customer_reviews.title: My Back Feels Much Better
customer_reviews.text: I love my yoga ball. It took a little getting used to. My core is getting stronger, so I'm able to stabilize the ball better. The stabilizing ring does not work for me. I don't use the ring at all. I know longer use my uncomfortable office chair when working. I sit on my yoga ball all day and do ab exercises while working. My abs and core are getting so much stronger doing this. Highly recommend a yoga ball when sitting at a desk all day!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing material for price
customer_reviews.text: It is very durable and high quality material. I have been hopping on it for hours for like 4 days and it hasn’t leaked even a bit. Very great value for price. Helps relieving stiff muscles and also great for yoga and back exercises. Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Maulik Masaliya

customer_reviews.title: Best ball ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 75cm ball, even though I am not 5'11 and I love this thing! I had it all the way pumped up but was a little too big to go under my desk, so I let some air out, and now I REALLY LOVE IT!! Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my daughter. At 5'5" it's better suited for her. As a 5'9" plus sized woman the 65 cm really is not a good fit. Appreciate the advice to allow it to relax and partially inflate a day. Just not enough.
customer_reviews.author: waterjewel

customer_reviews.title: Ummm.....
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with the quality of the product so far.... we will see how long it lasts. I pumped it up to 80% like its says and waited 24 hrs to fill the rest of the way. I had my doubts that it was going to reach 65cm. It got to about 57cm I'm not very happy about that 😡 and the stability ring definitely does not fit like the pic shows.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Benton

customer_reviews.title: Decent To sit on occasionally at the desk
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this ball to sit at my desk sometimes instead of my chair you still have to sit up straight but it’s a decent change back-and-forth
customer_reviews.author: Aim

customer_reviews.title: Okay, loses air very quickly
customer_reviews.text: This ball is okay. The process of inflating took a long time but was relatively easy with the foot pump. However, I've only had it for a week and have had to add more air twice already. I like the inflatable ring that comes with it to prevent it from rolling around. I feel like it helps my back but primarily when it's fully inflated. Probably wouldn't repurchase. Just ok.
customer_reviews.author: Lori A. McJury

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and ideal for pregnant women
customer_reviews.text: This ball helped me until the last day of my pregnancy and for the day of delivery. I was able to do a lot of exercises on it to prepare for my delivery and relieve pain and it really helped me a lot. I recommend it to all women who want to keep fit in their pregnancy and after the postpartum too.
customer_reviews.author: Ysabel

customer_reviews.title: I now love to exercise!
customer_reviews.text: I love this exercise ball! Finally exercising made fun. And I use the ball now instead of a desk chair and it's great! The ebook that came with the ball has good and fun exercises to follow. And this company's customer service is first rate.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Levin

customer_reviews.title: Exercise Ball
customer_reviews.text: I really like this exercise ball. I love the Stability ring that keeps the ball in place. With my MS this gives me ease of mind that the ball wont roll away when my nerves go hay wire. The Material is a thick material so no need to worry about it popping. The only thing i do not like is air pump, it was flimsy and made it hard to blow up.
customer_reviews.author: bridgette audible

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Office Desk
customer_reviews.text: On recommendation by my chiropractor to use a yoga ball for sitting at my desk...this is the perfect size, height! Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Lilacsnh

customer_reviews.title: Safe Exercise Ball
customer_reviews.text: This ball was great. The directions were easy to follow in terms of inflating. I waited the 24 hours and then completely inflated it. The fact that it has the stabilizer makes me feel so much better about working out using it. The material is sturdy and firm. It does not have the weird smell. I am happy with my purchase and the longevity of the ball.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany R.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I got it for two reasons: to use for birth and to exercise afterwards. It worked wonderfully during the contractions. The material looks durable.
customer_reviews.author: Ortal yahalomi

customer_reviews.title: so so
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how to use with the Stability Base Ring. Just can let the ball don't run away. so I think can just buy the ball only will cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: mekoko

customer_reviews.title: Larger than you'd think
customer_reviews.text: The 75cm was recommended for my height 6'1", but this ball is larger than any exercise ball I've ever seen before. Definitely too large for me. My tip to others would be to buy one size smaller than whatever is recommended by the seller. Ball quality seems fine, though.
customer_reviews.author: Mephisto

customer_reviews.title: Best exercise ball ever!
customer_reviews.text: I just finished inflating that exercise ball as I went by the maker or seller’s instructions sent by e-mail. It was pretty easy and I could definitely tell this has better quality than any other ones I’ve ever had. A ring for the ball is big plus! You would not regret to buy this one for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Choco

customer_reviews.title: Great for the core!
customer_reviews.text: The inflation is a little difficult but understandable as it comes with a manual air pump. Overall the quality is excellent for low impact exercising. I have trouble laying on the floor do to back issues. This makes it easy to do ab workouts and other exercises.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this exercise ball for over a week now and can say I don’t have any complaints. I followed the instructions regarding how to inflate your ball, and it hasn’t lost any air or lost its shape so far. I can only speak to the ball though as I haven’t tried the stability ring, but I’d imaginr it has to be a similar quality to the ball itself. So far, i’d say it’s worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer H

customer_reviews.title: Ball nice ring worthless
customer_reviews.text: The stability ring was worthless. It wouldn’t blow up and was to big for the ball.
customer_reviews.author: Honest

customer_reviews.title: Colors
customer_reviews.text: It is not turquoise. It is 100% just the bluest of blues. Not baby blue, not dark blue, just blue. Not a big deal if you like blue, as it's also 100% functional, but I'm OCD with color coordinating my everything so I'm a sad bear. I know I'm neurotic so I'm not too upset about it, but if you could change the color on the picture so it's not misleading, that would be neat! :)
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Osick

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: The ball is great. Works well. I’m using it at work for a chair. The pump it came with broke while I was trying to inflate it. It was kind of a pain to get completed.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Yep, it’s a large ball that I can sit on. I like.
customer_reviews.text: I like it well enough. It’s sturdy but that pump is from the Stone Age.
customer_reviews.author: Clara

customer_reviews.title: Durable exercise ball
customer_reviews.text: Ball was easy to inflate and instructions were simple to follow. Material feels very sturdy and durable.
customer_reviews.author: mc

customer_reviews.title: Product works as listed
customer_reviews.text: I gave pain relief 3 stars as I don't have any pain. I am using it for a desk chair but I know I can use it as an exercise ball too. Follow the instructions and you will be able to inflate the ball to the desired size. The included measuring tape is a handy tool.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo 1952

customer_reviews.title: It’s great
customer_reviews.text: I use it as my desk chair. My shoulder and back pain disappeared, since I am now working from home and my “Desk” is a tail gate table, I have the 75mm. I am 270lb and I top it off once a week.
customer_reviews.author: Special k

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for her as an office chair, she says it is really comfortable and really likes it came with a stability ring. It was easy to pump but took a little time. Over all I’m glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Durbin

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ball is great, the ring, for underneath the ball, popped when first inflated! Ugh!
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: workout/yoga ball
customer_reviews.text: bought for the wife. good present and she has enjoyed it. have had no issues and well made. comes with a pump and stability ring.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn walsh

customer_reviews.title: Excellent exercise ball
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. I use it for a wide variety of exercises and back therapy for my spine. I am a large woman and this exercise ball supports my weight very well and it is so fun to exercise with. All thumbs up on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Thine

customer_reviews.title: Deflated ball and base.
customer_reviews.text: Keeping the air in before plugging it is impossible. Once the plug goes in you can not take it out When I was trying to remove it and used the remove tool it broke. Now I have a deflated tube with a plug that can not be removed.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Hopefully y’all get what you ordered
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 75, box said 75... I received a 65 inside
customer_reviews.author: jme

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great cuality, better than expected, stability is perfect due to the second inflatory system, really recomend for those that want to workout at home.
customer_reviews.author: Ulysses

customer_reviews.title: Product presentation. Product quality
customer_reviews.text: The box was opened when it got here today. The packaging inside appeared to opened before I was able to, all retaped inside. Also, there no instructions. I'm fine with the product, but this wasn't prime delivery. I'm taking in to my PT tomorrow to get it inflated, I will let you know of product quality then.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what i needed!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. My son broke my other one. It is great!
customer_reviews.author: Meme Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great with or without the blow up ring underneath it
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what it says, inflates under 5 min
customer_reviews.text: I sit on it while I work from home. love it 💕
customer_reviews.author: Mara

customer_reviews.title: Great for home or office, strengthens core while comfortably seated
customer_reviews.text: Core/trunk strengthening, sit balance and part of my Netflix gym!
customer_reviews.author: CaliVal

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Omg this saved my life while pregnant. It helped with pain in back as well as good to keep safe for some excercise. Also helped baby get in position .
customer_reviews.author: Judahs mommy

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty yoga ball- good buy
customer_reviews.text: It’s a plastic ball, thick and durable and heavy duty. A good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Best Yoga Chair ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for watching TV, working and exercising .. definitely has relieved my neck and back pain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this ball
customer_reviews.text: My 5yo daughter loves doing her PT on this . She loves the texture and color . The ring helps me keep her safe .
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: A fun way to reinvigorate your workspace
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product for a few days and love it. It was pretty easy to inflate. I had a bit of trouble blowing up the stability tube because it is needed a quick plug. Otherwise, I love the product! It has added a pop of color to my desk at home!
customer_reviews.author: megan chester

customer_reviews.title: Owned a couple months and it popped
customer_reviews.text: We did love it and been using it for excercising but this afternoon my 8yr was on it and it popped. He was on soft carpet, simply laying over it tummy down watching football game when suddenly it split and began to deflate.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Taddeo

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product it is so easy to use and you can use it for your exercise routine is great
customer_reviews.author: Yamiha

customer_reviews.title: Replaced my office chair with this
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace the chair in my office that hurt my back to sit in all day. It did the trick. My lower back pain has lessened, and my posture has improved. It's fun to sit on a bouncy ball all day, too!
customer_reviews.author: A. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Color that came was blue, not teal!
customer_reviews.text: The reason I am not giving this 5 stars is because the color is not right (deep blue when I ordered teal) and it is a tad smaller. Teal was what I wanted for matching purposes. I am using this as a replacement for my desk chair.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Mize Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I thought I could use this more, but it seems a little small for me. I'm 5'10 and my knees come up past my hips. I thought the stability ring would be more stable but it's the same material as ball and inflatable as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: After using as a office chair, it burst after three months.
customer_reviews.text: The ball burst, i have an injured my back and tail bone.
customer_reviews.author: lance Howk

customer_reviews.title: Like my bouncy chair
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice and bouncy. The only problem I’ve seen so far is the ball loses the air. I use it on a daily basis. But only usibg it for an hour or so.
customer_reviews.author: Forooz

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured. The stability ring is nice being 8 1/2 months pregnant I don’t have to worry about rolling. It has really helped with my lower back pain. I wish I would’ve purchased it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: MLa

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: I received this package and it has been opened already, the ring was not in the box. The ball was smaller than expected, which was ok. Not getting the ring defeated the purpose. I look forward to being shipped a ring?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for the best yoga ball. This is the one. I'm a curvy grown woman and this is the best yoga ball to accommodate it.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Winfield

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size. The ring keeps the ball in position. Good quality material. The foot pump is exasperatingly cheap, but made do.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect desk chair
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace my desk chair at work and I love it! My core is mildly engaged all day and it helps keep me awake while sitting on the computer all day. My posture is improving too!
customer_reviews.author: jacqueline williams

customer_reviews.title: Finally what I’ve been looking for!!
customer_reviews.text: Yes! Yes! Yes! Finally stability AND pain relief when I have to sit for long hours. The inner tube is a game changer and you can feel the awesome quality. Definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It ok. Next time I would choose differently
customer_reviews.text: The ball isn't very stable in the ring. I purchased for my kindergarten. Alternative to a chair. I got the small size. She just seems to roll around the ring. I let some air out, hoping it rest better in the ring.
customer_reviews.author: Jes

customer_reviews.title: Leaking air
customer_reviews.text: It was great for a few days. But loosing air now I have to fill air every 2days.... When we sit on the ball I can hear air is leaking. This is great product if air is not leaking
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Preference listed isn’t important to them
customer_reviews.text: Barely had the ball but seems to be doing its job. Only negative was I asked for black and the ball was purple. Didn’t even know that was an option as a color. Hate the color but it’ll do.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Reyna

customer_reviews.title: Missing items. Damaged.
customer_reviews.text: I received the product torn open with items missing. It looked like it was taped back together. Box was crushed and damaged missing the inflatable ball and other items.
customer_reviews.author: DJC

customer_reviews.title: Great for bouncing a newborn
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this ball! It’s a little annoying to inflate with the small pump but so worth it. I’m using it to sit and bounce my newborn - and it’s a life saver on my back and legs!!
customer_reviews.author: Jake Rowoldt

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: Best thing I have bought for my home office. If you have lower back and\or hip pain this defiantly helps!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great experience
customer_reviews.text: Starting using my exercise ball yesterday, I thought it would be a lot harder, even thought I might fall. No wonderful, I fell very comfortable and so easy to get started
customer_reviews.author: lorraine young

customer_reviews.title: Calm down it’s just a yoga ball lol
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift and it’s a yoga ball, fairly hard to mess that up. Shipping was fast...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The rubber on this ball deteriorated after 2 months, leaving a sticky residue on my hardwood floor. Very disappointed with the quality of this ball.
customer_reviews.author: cc

customer_reviews.title: Yoga ball
customer_reviews.text: First experience with a yoga ball and it was easy to blow up. It is my new office chair!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I love it!!! I work at a desk all day and this is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Mindi dalton

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: Not as expected. Ball not as firm as my other’s so not effective on providing support to sit and exercise on.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: There is a big hole in the ball!
customer_reviews.text: My ball came popped. Not happy because I’m 37 weeks pregnant and really needed it.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Price

customer_reviews.title: Pretty color
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable for sitting at a desk & my daughter loved the color.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Williams

customer_reviews.title: Recommend fast fingers and and a bike pump
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to inflate, but it took forever with the dinky bellow pump they included. Also loses air quickly so plug it quickly after you inflate! Feels a little sticky on the outside, not sure if that's what rubber is supposed to be like, but it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Ting Z.

product_meta.title: Yoga Ball Chair (55cm, 65cm & 75cm) - Exercise Ball & Stability Ring. For Pregnancy, Balance, Pilates or Birthing Therapy. Use at Office, Gym or Home. Anti-Burst and Anti-Slip Premium Grade.
feature_bullets: BASE INCLUDED - Stop your gym ball rolling during yoga poses, pregnancy, birth and physio therapy exercises.

FOR BEST PERFORMANCE - Our Anti Slip material helps you blast through your workout routine without worry of dropping it. At 65cm diameter, this size is ideal for heights of 162cm - 178cm and will help you get the most out of your exercises.

DURABLE HEAVY DUTY - Unlike cheaper grade swiss balls that can burst, ours is Professional Grade, Anti Burst, Hypo-Allergenic PVC, strongly recommended for maximum safety. Rated to withstand 2000lbs static weight and will deflate safely when punctured, rather than bursting suddenly like a balloon.

ALL INCLUSIVE BUNDLE - Comes with inflatable base, Ebook, mini foot pump, measuring tape, spare air stopper plug and plug removal tool to get you started straight away. Whether if its for fitness or maternity exercises, we've got you covered!
RISK FREE - Does this come with a Money Back Guarantee? YES! Your purchase comes with a full 90 day no-risk, no-nonsense guarantee. Also includes a 12 Months Replacement Warranty.
